description:
The apartment is in a great neighborhood in lower-midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Herald Square, the Empire State Building, nightlife, etc. You can actually see the Empire State building from the street corner :-p

The subway is a 5 - 10 minute walk away. There's tons of restaurants in the area, grocery stores such as Fairway and Trader Joe's within a 5 minute walk, a pharmacy (Rite Aid), even a laundromat and a hardware store!

Anything else you'd like to know, feel free to ask!

The nearest subway is the 6 train that's about 5 - 10 minutes away. You can also use the buses along 2nd Ave to get around, and of course walk to just about anywhere in the city!
name: Full 1 bedroom apt in an awesome area!
review: Verun we great and so was the apartment. The apartment is very close to food and night life and the apartment has an elevator which is really convenient especially if you are traveling with luggage. Verun was kind, flexible, and very accommodating! We would definitely recommend this place!!
